title: Can hard CC's duration be reduced by like 25-50% in ARURF
body:
1 champion alone ({{champion:25}} for example) can perma hard cc chain you, and then it is just unfair (for URF standards that is). Other champions come close to permanent ({{champion:33}} {{champion:78}} for example), but at least you have a slim chance to dodge or flash out or use an ability, maybe.

If a hard 25-50% reduction is too much, then maybe treat it like healing and it scales back to full duration later in the game.

replies.body:
CC isn't the strongest thing.

It's avoiding it {{champion:114}}{{champion:2}}
aren't they already reduced by like 60% though?
I dont think they are directly, at least not from what I can see. You have a tenacity boost of 25%, but that does not cover all of it.

It is already reduced by 25%.

Welcome to urf, gunblade nunu OP. gunblade everything OP.
